ar: وَيَـٰقَوْمِ مَا لِىٓ أَدْعُوكُمْ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ
en: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation
while you invite me to the Fire?
You invite me to disbelieve in Allah
that of which I have no knowledge,
and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
Assuredly, that to which you invite me
in this world or in the Hereafter;
and indeed, our return is to Allah,
and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.
